attributes.action: Award David Hasslehoff an honorary Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For contribution to television, art and law enforcement make "the Hoff" a true Knight, protector of the realm.

Recognise Mr Hasslebank for his many  and avried outstanding acting performances plus his steadfast promotion of vehicular artifical inteligence.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
